backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles and service requests with access control, status updates, notes, and request creation logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a footer support-phone update to affected files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, icons, OG tags, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing setup with layout, public pages, admin-guarded routes, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/admin/NotesPanel: Manages public and internal request notes with tabs, note creation, and listing. Integrates with backend mutations and shows timestamps and authors.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with login prompt if unauthenticated. Provides navigation back to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Restricts access to admin-only routes by checking identity and admin status. Shows a loader while validating and displays an access-denied screen if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Toggles login/logout using Internet Identity and clears query state on logout. Displays loading, login, or logout UI states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new authenticated users to create a basic profile with name and optional email. Saves the profile via backend mutation and blocks closing until completion.
frontend/src/components/BrandCard.tsx: Simple styled card component applying consistent border, background, and rounded UI.
frontend/src/components/FormField.tsx: Reusable form field wrapper showing labels, helper text, errors, and required indicators.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Pricing section component showing categorized services with prices using catalog utilities.
frontend/src/components/RequestStatusTim: Timeline component displaying request status history in sorted order with visual markers.
frontend/src/components/ServiceSelection: Renders grouped service checkboxes allowing users to toggle selections and view prices. Filters services by category and updates selection state via callbacks.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Displays a multi-column site footer with service links, support info, and branding. Includes dynamic year and referral link generation.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides the main site header with navigation, login button, and mobile menu. Supports smooth scrolling to the pricing section and admin link visibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, including admin token initialization. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientSideReferenc: Manages client-side reference image files with preview URLs. Supports adding, removing, and clearing images while cleaning up object URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for creating, retrieving, and updating service requests and notes through the backend actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers, custom CSS variables for themes, and applies base background and text colors.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports app branding constants including name, subtitle, and combined title.
frontend/src/lib/servicesCatalog.ts: Defines a catalog of services with pricing and helpers for filtering, formatting prices, and calculating totals.
frontend/src/lib/statusUtils.ts: Maps backend request statuses to human-readable labels and UI variants.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRequestDet: Admin view for a single request with status updates, price editing, and access to notes and full request details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRequestsPa: Admin list of all service requests with status filtering and navigation to detailed request views.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Implements the marketing landing page with hero, services, and navigation actions, handling initial hash-based scrolling.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceRequestConfirm: Displays confirmation details for a submitted service request, including the request ID and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceRequestPage.ts: Form page for creating a service request, handling validation, image uploads, service selection, and submission via createRequest.
frontend/src/pages/StatusLookupPage.tsx: Allows users to enter a request ID and view its status, showing errors and a status timeline when applicable.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin usage for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for adding a phone number to the Support & Contact Us section and updating the site logo. Includes existing features, new requests, and notes that the logo update is blocked pending the asset.
